        protected void initializeGame()
        Description copied from class: YaegerApplication
        Use this method for game initialization code.

        Initialization options are:

        • setSize()
        • setGameTitle()
        Specified by:
        initializeGame in class YaegerApplication

      • setupScenes

        protected void setupScenes()
        Description copied from class: YaegerApplication
        Use this method to add the instances of YaegerScene that make up the Game. A YaegerScene will usually either be a level, a welcome-screen, an intro-screen or a game-over screen, for instance.

        To create a YaegerScene extend either a StaticScene or a DynamicScene. A StaticScene should be used for simple screens that do not need the Game world Update cycle. If such an cycle is required, extend a DynamicScene.

        Specified by:
        setupScenes in class YaegerApplication

      • setActiveScene

        public void setActiveScene​(int scene)
        Description copied from class: YaegerApplication
        Set the current active YaegerScene.
        Overrides:
        setActiveScene in class YaegerApplication
        Parameters:
        scene - The Integer identifying the YaegerScene
